name: The lonely(game jam)
description:
The lonely 

A game made for the brakeys game jam, 

story:

you are in your house along working on a project while your parents are out on a business trip, suddenly you feel tired 

so you decide to head to bed, when you get in your room you lay down, but you can't really seem to fall asleep you then hear a noise. 

so you get out bed go downstairs and to see what it is, you then see  a random homeless guy banging on your window,

but that's weird, you don't have any close neighbors but you decide it's not that import since he doesn't seem like a threat

but before you know it the power goes out. you are now forced to go 

downstairs to the basement to turn on the generator.

you look forward in shock as you see the same man standing in the kitchen, with his neck broken and you black out.
